00044         (

00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4()
00068         {
00069                 T Zero(0);
00070                 T One(1);
00071                 this->value[0] = col_type(One, Zero, Zero, Zero);
00072                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, One, Zero, Zero);
00073                 this->value[2] = col_type(Zero, Zero, One, Zero);
00074                 this->value[3] = col_type(Zero, Zero, Zero, One);
00075         }
00076

00078         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00079         (
00080                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00081         )
00082         {
00083                 this->value[0] = m[0];
00084                 this->value[1] = m[1];
00085                 this->value[2] = m[2];
00086                 this->value[3] = m[3];
00087         }

00109         template <typename T, precision P>
00110         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00111         (
00112                 T const & s
00113         )
00114         {
00115                 value_type const Zero(0);
00116                 this->value[0] = col_type(s, Zero, Zero, Zero);
00117                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, s, Zero, Zero);
00118                 this->value[2] = col_type(Zero, Zero, s, Zero);
00119                 this->value[3] = col_type(Zero, Zero, Zero, s);
00120         }

00122         template <typename T, precision P>
00123         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00124         (
00125                 T const & x0, T const & y0, T const & z0, T const & w0,
00126                 T const & x1, T const & y1, T const & z1, T const & w1,
00127                 T const & x2, T const & y2, T const & z2, T const & w2,
00128                 T const & x3, T const & y3, T const & z3, T const & w3
00129         )
00130         {
00131                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0, z0, w0);
00132                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1, z1, w1);
00133                 this->value[2] = col_type(x2, y2, z2, w2);
00134                 this->value[3] = col_type(x3, y3, z3, w3);
00135         }

00166         // Conversion constructors
00167         template <typename T, precision P> 
00168         template <
00169                 typename X1, typename Y1, typename Z1, typename W1,
00170                 typename X2, typename Y2, typename Z2, typename W2,
00171                 typename X3, typename Y3, typename Z3, typename W3,
00172                 typename X4, typename Y4, typename Z4, typename W4>
00173         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00174         (
00175                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1, Z1 const & z1, W1 const & w1,
00176                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2, Z2 const & z2, W2 const & w2,
00177                 X3 const & x3, Y3 const & y3, Z3 const & z3, W3 const & w3,
00178                 X4 const & x4, Y4 const & y4, Z4 const & z4, W4 const & w4
00179         )
00180         {
00181                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<X1>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<X1>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 1st parameter type invalid.");
00182                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Y1>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Y1>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 2nd parameter type invalid.");
00183                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Z1>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Z1>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 3rd parameter type invalid.");
00184                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<W1>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<W1>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 4th parameter type invalid.");
00185 
00186                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<X2>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<X2>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 5th parameter type invalid.");
00187                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Y2>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Y2>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 6th parameter type invalid.");
00188                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Z2>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Z2>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 7th parameter type invalid.");
00189                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<W2>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<W2>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 8th parameter type invalid.");
00190 
00191                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<X3>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<X3>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 9th parameter type invalid.");
00192                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Y3>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Y3>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 10th parameter type invalid.");
00193                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Z3>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Z3>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 11th parameter type invalid.");
00194                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<W3>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<W3>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 12th parameter type invalid.");
00195 
00196                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<X4>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<X4>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 13th parameter type invalid.");
00197                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Y4>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Y4>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 14th parameter type invalid.");
00198                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<Z4>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<Z4>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 15th parameter type invalid.");
00199                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<W4>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<W4>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 16th parameter type invalid.");
00200 
00201                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1), value_type(z1), value_type(w1));
00202                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2), value_type(z2), value_type(w2));
00203                 this->value[2] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x3), value_type(y3), value_type(z3), value_type(w3));
00204                 this->value[3] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x4), value_type(y4), value_type(z4), value_type(w4));
00205         }

00207         template <typename T, precision P>
00208         template <typename V1, typename V2, typename V3, typename V4>
00209         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00210         (
00211                 tvec4<V1, P> const & v1,
00212                 tvec4<V2, P> const & v2,
00213                 tvec4<V3, P> const & v3,
00214                 tvec4<V4, P> const & v4
00215         )               
00216         {
00217                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<V1>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<V1>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 1st parameter type invalid.");
00218                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<V2>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<V2>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 2nd parameter type invalid.");
00219                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<V3>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<V3>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 3rd parameter type invalid.");
00220                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<V4>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<V4>::is_integer, "*mat4x4 constructor only takes float and integer types, 4th parameter type invalid.");
00221 
00222                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00223                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00224                 this->value[2] = col_type(v3);
00225                 this->value[3] = col_type(v4);
00226         }

00229         // Matrix convertion constructors
00230         template <typename T, precision P>
00231         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00232         (
00233                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00234         )
00235         {
00236                 this->value[0] = col_type(m[0], detail::tvec2<T, P>(0));
00237                 this->value[1] = col_type(m[1], detail::tvec2<T, P>(0));
00238                 this->value[2] = col_type(static_cast<T>(0));
00239                 this->value[3] = col_type(static_cast<T>(0), value_type(0), value_type(0), value_type(1));
00240         }

00243         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P>::tmat4x4
00244         (

00246         )

00333         )
00334         {
00335                 //memcpy could be faster

00340                 this->value[3] = m[3];
00341                 return *this;

00433         template <typename T, precision P>
00434         template <typename U>
00435         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> & tmat4x4<T, P>::operator/= (tmat4x4<U, P> const & m)
00436         {
00437                 return (*this = *this * detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat4x4, T, P>::call(m));
00438         }

00469         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> tmat4x4<T, P>::operator--(int)
00470         {

00475 
00476         template <typename T, precision P>
00477         struct compute_inverse<detail::tmat4x4, T, P>
00478         {
00479                 static detail::tmat4x4<T, P> call(detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m)
00480                 {
00481                         T Coef00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00482                         T Coef02 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00483                         T Coef03 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00484 
00485                         T Coef04 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00486                         T Coef06 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00487                         T Coef07 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00488 
00489                         T Coef08 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00490                         T Coef10 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00491                         T Coef11 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00492 
00493                         T Coef12 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00494                         T Coef14 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00495                         T Coef15 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00496 
00497                         T Coef16 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00498                         T Coef18 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00499                         T Coef19 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00500 
00501                         T Coef20 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00502                         T Coef22 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00503                         T Coef23 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00504 
00505                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac0(Coef00, Coef00, Coef02, Coef03);
00506                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac1(Coef04, Coef04, Coef06, Coef07);
00507                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac2(Coef08, Coef08, Coef10, Coef11);
00508                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac3(Coef12, Coef12, Coef14, Coef15);
00509                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac4(Coef16, Coef16, Coef18, Coef19);
00510                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Fac5(Coef20, Coef20, Coef22, Coef23);
00511 
00512                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Vec0(m[1][0], m[0][0], m[0][0], m[0][0]);
00513                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Vec1(m[1][1], m[0][1], m[0][1], m[0][1]);
00514                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Vec2(m[1][2], m[0][2], m[0][2], m[0][2]);
00515                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Vec3(m[1][3], m[0][3], m[0][3], m[0][3]);
00516 
00517                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Inv0(Vec1 * Fac0 - Vec2 * Fac1 + Vec3 * Fac2);
00518                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Inv1(Vec0 * Fac0 - Vec2 * Fac3 + Vec3 * Fac4);
00519                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Inv2(Vec0 * Fac1 - Vec1 * Fac3 + Vec3 * Fac5);
00520                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Inv3(Vec0 * Fac2 - Vec1 * Fac4 + Vec2 * Fac5);
00521 
00522                         detail::tvec4<T, P> SignA(+1, -1, +1, -1);
00523                         detail::tvec4<T, P> SignB(-1, +1, -1, +1);
00524                         detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Inverse(Inv0 * SignA, Inv1 * SignB, Inv2 * SignA, Inv3 * SignB);
00525 
00526                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Row0(Inverse[0][0], Inverse[1][0], Inverse[2][0], Inverse[3][0]);
00527 
00528                         detail::tvec4<T, P> Dot0(m[0] * Row0);
00529                         T Dot1 = (Dot0.x + Dot0.y) + (Dot0.z + Dot0.w);
00530 
00531                         T OneOverDeterminant = static_cast<T>(1) / Dot1;
00532 
00533                         return Inverse * OneOverDeterminant;
00534                 }
00535         };
00536

00541                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00542                 T const & s
00543         )
00544         {

00546                         m[0] + s,
00547                         m[1] + s,
00548                         m[2] + s,
00549                         m[3] + s);
00550         }

00650         template <typename T, precision P>
00651         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type operator*
00652         (
00653                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00654                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::row_type const & v
00655         )
00656         {
00657 /*
00658                 __m128 v0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.data, v.data, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00659                 __m128 v1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.data, v.data, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00660                 __m128 v2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.data, v.data, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00661                 __m128 v3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v.data, v.data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00662 
00663                 __m128 m0 = _mm_mul_ps(m[0].data, v0);
00664                 __m128 m1 = _mm_mul_ps(m[1].data, v1);
00665                 __m128 a0 = _mm_add_ps(m0, m1);
00666 
00667                 __m128 m2 = _mm_mul_ps(m[2].data, v2);
00668                 __m128 m3 = _mm_mul_ps(m[3].data, v3);
00669                 __m128 a1 = _mm_add_ps(m2, m3);
00670 
00671                 __m128 a2 = _mm_add_ps(a0, a1);
00672 
00673                 return typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type(a2);
00674 */
00675 
00676                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mov0(v[0]);
00677                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mov1(v[1]);
00678                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mul0 = m[0] * Mov0;
00679                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mul1 = m[1] * Mov1;
00680                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Add0 = Mul0 + Mul1;
00681                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mov2(v[2]);
00682                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mov3(v[3]);
00683                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mul2 = m[2] * Mov2;
00684                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Mul3 = m[3] * Mov3;
00685                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Add1 = Mul2 + Mul3;
00686                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const Add2 = Add0 + Add1;
00687                 return Add2;
00688 
00689 /*
00690                 return typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type(
00691                         m[0][0] * v[0] + m[1][0] * v[1] + m[2][0] * v[2] + m[3][0] * v[3],
00692                         m[0][1] * v[0] + m[1][1] * v[1] + m[2][1] * v[2] + m[3][1] * v[3],
00693                         m[0][2] * v[0] + m[1][2] * v[1] + m[2][2] * v[2] + m[3][2] * v[3],
00694                         m[0][3] * v[0] + m[1][3] * v[1] + m[2][3] * v[2] + m[3][3] * v[3]);
00695 */
00696         }

00698         template <typename T, precision P>
00699         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat4x4<T, P>::row_type operator*
00700         (
00701                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00702                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00703         )
00704         {
00705                 return typename tmat4x4<T, P>::row_type(
00706                         m[0][0] * v[0] + m[0][1] * v[1] + m[0][2] * v[2] + m[0][3] * v[3],
00707                         m[1][0] * v[0] + m[1][1] * v[1] + m[1][2] * v[2] + m[1][3] * v[3],
00708                         m[2][0] * v[0] + m[2][1] * v[1] + m[2][2] * v[2] + m[2][3] * v[3],
00709                         m[3][0] * v[0] + m[3][1] * v[1] + m[3][2] * v[2] + m[3][3] * v[3]);
00710         }

00717         )

00720                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][0] * m2[0][3],
00721                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][1] * m2[0][3],
00722                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][2] * m2[0][3],
00723                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][3] * m2[0][3],
00724                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][0] * m2[1][3],
00725                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][1] * m2[1][3],
00726                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][2] * m2[1][3],
00727                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][3] * m2[1][3]);

00732         (
00733                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00734                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m2
00735         )
00736         {
00737                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00738                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][0] * m2[0][3],
00739                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][1] * m2[0][3],
00740                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][2] * m2[0][3],
00741                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[0][2] + m1[3][3] * m2[0][3],
00742                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][0] * m2[1][3],
00743                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][1] * m2[1][3],
00744                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][2] * m2[1][3],
00745                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[1][2] + m1[3][3] * m2[1][3],
00746                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[2][2] + m1[3][0] * m2[2][3],
00747                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[2][2] + m1[3][1] * m2[2][3],
00748                         m1[0][2] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[2][2] + m1[3][2] * m2[2][3],
00749                         m1[0][3] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[2][2] + m1[3][3] * m2[2][3]);
00750         }
00751 
00752         template <typename T, precision P>
00753         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> operator*
00754         (
00755                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00756                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m2
00757         )
00758         {
00759                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcA0 = m1[0];
00760                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcA1 = m1[1];
00761                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcA2 = m1[2];
00762                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcA3 = m1[3];
00763 
00764                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcB0 = m2[0];
00765                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcB1 = m2[1];
00766                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcB2 = m2[2];
00767                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const SrcB3 = m2[3];
00768 
00769                 tmat4x4<T, P> Result(tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00770                 Result[0] = SrcA0 * SrcB0[0] + SrcA1 * SrcB0[1] + SrcA2 * SrcB0[2] + SrcA3 * SrcB0[3];
00771                 Result[1] = SrcA0 * SrcB1[0] + SrcA1 * SrcB1[1] + SrcA2 * SrcB1[2] + SrcA3 * SrcB1[3];
00772                 Result[2] = SrcA0 * SrcB2[0] + SrcA1 * SrcB2[1] + SrcA2 * SrcB2[2] + SrcA3 * SrcB2[3];
00773                 Result[3] = SrcA0 * SrcB3[0] + SrcA1 * SrcB3[1] + SrcA2 * SrcB3[2] + SrcA3 * SrcB3[3];
00774                 return Result;
00775         }

00805         template <typename T, precision P>
00806         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type operator/
00807         (
00808                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00809                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::row_type const & v
00810         )
00811         {
00812                 return detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat4x4, T, P>::call(m) * v;
00813         }
00814 
00815         template <typename T, precision P>
00816         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat4x4<T, P>::row_type operator/
00817         (
00818                 typename tmat4x4<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00819                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m
00820         )
00821         {
00822                 return v * detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat4x4, T, P>::call(m);
00823         }

00825         template <typename T, precision P>
00826         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> operator/
00827         (
00828                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00829                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m2
00830         )
00831         {
00832                 tmat4x4<T, P> m1_copy(m1);
00833                 return m1_copy /= m2;
00834         }

00879         // Boolean operators
00880 
00881         template <typename T, precision P>
00882         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00883         (
00884                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00885                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m2
00886         )
00887         {
00888                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]) && (m1[2] == m2[2]) && (m1[3] == m2[3]);
00889         }
00890 
00891         template <typename T, precision P>
00892         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00893         (
00894                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m1,
00895                 tmat4x4<T, P> const & m2
00896         )
00897         {
00898                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]) || (m1[2] != m2[2]) || (m1[3] != m2[3]);
00899         }
